New Personal Website

by Allen Y. Lin

October 15, 2015
in Misc

New site set up! To avoid paying the fee for web hosting, I decide to take advantages of the free home page space provided by the Department of Computer Science and Engineering, University of Minnesota, Twin Cities and migrate my personal webstie here! I will start (slowly) moving my old posts from my WordPress site to here if there is merits.

All are welcomed!
